SEARCH
Module org.example.pandaexpresspos
Package org.example.pandaexpresspos.models

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
org.example.pandaexpresspos.models.MenuItem
public class MenuItem extends Object
The MenuItem class represents an item on the menu in the Panda Express POS system. It stores information about the menu item, including its ID, price, name, and associated inventory items.
Author:
Kevin Zhang

      public MenuItem(UUID menuItemId, Double price, String itemName)

      menuItemId - the unique ID of the menu item
      price - the price of the menu item
      itemName - the name of the menu item

  • Method Details

    • addOrUpdateInventoryItem

      public void addOrUpdateInventoryItem(InventoryItem item, Integer quantity)
      Adds or updates the quantity of an InventoryItem required for this menu item.
      Parameters:
      item - the inventory item to be added or updated
      quantity - the quantity of the inventory item required for the menu item

    • isAvailable

      public Boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the menu item is available based on the availability of its required inventory items.
      Returns:
      true if all inventory items required for the menu item are available, false otherwise
